name: Game Grumps -Scare to Care fan game
name_original: Game Grumps -Scare to Care fan game
description:
This is a fan game made in a couple days for the Game Grumps upcoming Scare to Care charity livestream on July 28th 2018.

Play as Arin, Dan, Ross, Suzy or Brian as you escape from Frank, a dude who can't stand people who get drunk at house parties.

The game consists of 4 minigames: an endles runner/platformer where you jump across censor bars, a bullet-hell type game where you avoid alcoholic beverages, a click-the-right-things-quickly game and a type-out-this-sentence-quickly-without-mistakes game. These get quicker as the game goes on.

Try to get the highest score
